text:
Recurrent Adult Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia
														                    Standard treatment of recurrent adult ALL may include the following:         -  Combination chemotherapy followed by stem cell transplant.     - Low-dose radiation therapy as palliative care to relieve symptoms and improve the quality of life.    -  Tyrosine kinase inhibitor therapy with dasatinib for certain patients.        Some of the treatments being studied in clinical trials for recurrent adult
